img.alt: Drawing of a city. There is one very large building, and many groups of smaller structures. The city is surrounded by a large wall.

p.em: Cities forever changed the way humans lived. Cities connected the people living in them to one another, to surrounding farmland, and to people in other cities.

qti-stimulus-body.p: Like agriculture, the world's first cities developed independently in different parts of the world at different times.
